<p>This adds a linked superscript {% fn 15 %}</p>

<p>This adds a linked superscript {% fn 20 %}</p>
<p>{{ 'This is the actual footnote; with a <a href="www.github.com">link</a> as well! and a single quote &#39; too!'  | fndetail: 20 }}</p>
